content.question: A historian studying the African slave trade could best use this excerpt to

choices.label: examine the expansion of European powers into Western Africa
highlight the impact of slave trading on communities in Africa
demonstrate the profitability of the commerce in enslaved Africans
show the ways in which African captives would resist enslavement

content.answer: show the ways in which African captives would resist enslavement

topic.text: 2.4: African Resistance on Slave Ships and the Antislavery Movement

skill.text: 2.A: Identify and explain a source's claim(s), evidence, and reasoning.
